experience.desc: I am responsible for the maintenance of the Majoo Dashboard application to ensure its continuous and proper functioning, which encompasses the following tasks:
content: Fixing bugs in the existing e-commerce integration feature of the dashboard application.
Develop the food order integration feature, specifically incorporating GoFood and GrabMart, into the dashboard application.
Convert the UI/UX design from Figma into a web application.
Review the codes in the pull request submitted by the junior developer.

experience.desc:
Building HRIS tool platform to manage internal data such as attendance, reimbursement, annual leave, government administration and realtime news from scratch.

content: Lead the Web-Based HRIS SEMANGAT (Sistem Manajemen Terpusat) Dashboard project development
Developing SEMANGAT (Sistem Manajemen Terpusat) Mobile Apps Based On Android and IOS for User Endpoint
Developing API system for centralized data management from dashboards and mobile applications
Building platforms for SEMANGAT ecosystem with CI/CD deployment pipelines and lifecycle.

experience.desc:

Handling and creating ticket user hardware and software company complaint
